title: 3bed/2bath Gorgeous Home available
posting_body: -Beautiful
3bdr 2 bath remodelled, painted house, with modern modular kitchen, remodelled bathrooms, skylight, new appliances, AC, furnace and new refrigerator.
2 miles from Apple headquarters, in the most desirable school district, and 1 block from beautiful hiking/biking trails.
- 1415sq ft, 6000 sq ft lot.
- Hardwood flooring everywhere
- Remodelled Kitchen with quartz countertop, stainless steel GAS cooktop, High end, silent, KitchenAid Dishwasher, KitchenAid Gas Cooktop & Microwave.
NEW 2 door stainless steel GE Fridge
- Remodeled single Living, Dining and Family Room!
(lovely entertainment area)
- Hahn RO 4 stage under sink water filter installed (filter change in future on renter)
- Dual Pane windows and Patio Door - Remodelled bathrooms.
Master bathroom, with stood shower & hallway bath with tub over shower.
- Central Lennox AC with newly replaced ducts in all rooms, for cleaner air
- Remodelled Closets with shelving + double row hangers!
-Laundry with washer (GE) and dryer (Maytag) in garage.
- Backyard has fruit trees like plums, oranges, lemon & lemon grass Easy access to Highway 85, I-280, Near Apple Campus - Close to Ranch 99, Whole Food, Trader Joe's - Attached 2 car garage
- Award Winning School district - Either Blue Hill or Lincoln Elementary - John Kennedy Middle - Monta Vista High (For enrollment please verify with School district) -New
Roof -T&C: $5K security deposit, 1 yr lease minimum, All utilities on renter.
Owner to provide every 2 weeks Gardner service, Q'ly Pest control service, and home warranty (AHS).
Renter to pay $75 service call fee for every home warranty service (~ 48hr turnaround time for plumbing as eg, owner not liable for AHS turnaround time for service).
Also renter will be required to have rental insurance.
Renter to change furnace/ac filter every 3-6months.
No pets.
No smoking.
No Drugs.
Background checks will be done, No evictions and history of missed rental payment.
Verifiable income of at least 3 times the rent amount required.
2 years positive verifiable housing history required - 5% discount if renter pre-pays whole year rent on start date of lease!
